author: manunlp
content:
My proposal brings two changes:
1. The switch of a VC from one BN to another is solved by the "never decrease `cgc`, even across restarts" proposal.
2. When the `cgc` increases: If the node chooses to backfill, then the new `cgc` will be advertised "fast", as soon as the backfill process is done. If the  node chooses not to backfill, then the new `cgc` will be advertised only after 18 days..
